title: Data Theft Simulation – SWG Audit
description: Test perimeter security against data exfiltration. File upload (Level 1–2), DLP signatures, DNS exfil simulation. Uploaded files deleted after 10 minutes.
keywords: SWG Audit, data theft test, DLP, file upload, exfiltration, perimeter security
headline: Validate the real-world effectiveness of your perimeter security against Data Theft
subline: DLP and SWG controls block or disrupt file uploads and DNS tunnelling. File upload (Level 1–2), DLP signatures, DNS exfil. Max file size 1 KB. Max 5 uploads per session. Files are deleted from the server after 10 minutes. Run from a device that routes through the perimeter under test.
